topic: Live updates: Australia face India in third T20, scores and commentary

ideas.title: Yarra Trams-mission Impossible
ideas.premise: An Aussie batsman tries to check the live cricket score on his phone, but the Yarra Trams wifi is so bad, it says 'Buffering...India won!'
ideas.why_funny: Relatable pain of Melbourne public transport wifi ruining the moment.

ideas.title: Shane Warne's Ghost Commentary
ideas.premise: Shane Warne's ghost provides incredibly detailed (and slightly inappropriate) commentary from the MCG upper deck.
ideas.why_funny: Warnie was legendary; irreverent ghost commentary would be hilarious.

ideas.title: Hobart Hold Up
ideas.premise: A cartoon showing the India vs Australia match playing in Hobart but every character is wearing a balaclava and holding up a bank.
ideas.why_funny: Plays on Hobart's reputation as a sleepy town suddenly thrust into the spotlight.

ideas.title: Kookaburra Commentary
ideas.premise: Two kookaburras provide colour commentary; mistaking sixes for particularly good worm catches.
ideas.why_funny: Australian wildlife commenting on the match, hilariously misunderstanding it.

ideas.title: Vegemite Vision
ideas.premise: An Indian fan, overwhelmed by Vegemite, hallucinates that the cricket ball is a giant Vegemite scroll.
ideas.why_funny: Plays on the cultural differences and Vegemite's polarizing flavour.
